metadata.title: CVE-2021-30472 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in PoDoFo 0.9.7. A stack-based buffer overflow inPdfEncryptMD5Base::ComputeOwnerKey function in PdfEncrypt.cpp is possiblebecause of a improper check of the keyLength value.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
